name: Avoider (itch) (UnNamedDev)
description:
Hello and welcome to my game Avoider.

 In this game, you have to avoid enemies that try to attack you. 

To control your character, simply

press the left mouse button or tap anywhere on the screen.  Then, move your mouse/finger in the direction you want to go.  Release the left mouse button to shoot your character in the direction you want to go.

Good luck and thanks for playing.

Don't forget to leave a comment :D
